| HistoryText             = A collaborative group of like-minded agrochemists, bio-technologists, and eugenic engineers who specialize in the genetic manipulation —and propagation— of all things botanical. Their goal is the radical depopulation of humanity and the return of the planet to what they would consider "a more pristine state".{{r|X-Men Vol 5 3}}

Beyond biological modifications believed to have been made to themselves (unconfirmed outside of a documented resistance to [[Telepathy|telepathy]] and inklings to extended longevity), the women of Hordeculture are experts at manipulating the environment to suit their extinction agenda.{{r|X-Men Vol 5 3}} They are also computer programmers, selling software to [[Orchis (Earth-616)|Orchis]] to monitor [[Krakoa]]n [[Gateways]].{{r|Inferno Vol 2 1}}

It is unknown if there are more than four Hordeculture members.
